params.text: Sawubona! UBea ujabule kakhulu namuhla.
Kumele kube khona isimangaliso esimlindile.
O! Akukho lutho? Baphi abantu?
“  Mama, uyazi ukuthi namuhla kuyini?  ”  kubuza uBea. “ Namuhla usuku lokupheka, ”  kuphendula uMama. Awu ngeke! Umama ukhohliwe!
“ Dadewethu, uyazi ukuthi namuhla kuyini? ” kubuza uBea.  “ Namuhla usuku lokudweba, ” kusho udadewabo. UBea uyazibuza ukuthi kungani udadewabo engakhumbuli.
“ Mfowethu omncane, yiluphi usuku namuhla? ” kubuza uBea.  “ Ibhola! Ibhola!  ”  kusho umfowabo.
Mhlawumbe abangane bakaBea bazokhumbula!
“ Unogwaja , yiluphi usuku namuhla?  ”  kubuza uBea. “ Namuhla usuku lokuthunga, ”  kusho unogwaja .
“ Xhama, yiluphi usuku namuhla? ”  kubuza uBea.  “  Namuhla usuku lokuvuna, ”  kuphendula inyamazane . UBea uqala ukuzizwa edabukile.
Inkawu ithi usuku lokukha izithelo. Isixoxo sithi usuku lokucula. Indlovu ithi usuku lokufunda izincwadi.
Akekho okhumbula ukuthi namuhla usuku olukhethekile lukaBea!
UBea udabukile futhi ukhathele.
Umbukele inkosi yakho ngemini yokuzalwa, Bea!
Eqinisweni, wonke umuntu wakhumbula! UBea ujabule kakhulu.

“Yiluphi Usuku?” credits

This work, “Yiluphi Usuku?” is a derivative of Hari Apakah Ini? (What Day Is It?), Author: Vannia Rizky Santoso. Illustrator: Vannia Rizky Santoso. Published by The Asia Foundation - Let's Read, https://www.letsreadasia.org © The Asia Foundation - Let's Read. Released under CC BY-NC 4.0.

“Yiluphi Usuku?” is licensed under CC BY 4.0 by Curious Learning.

Book builder - Abraham Jerry Kakooza
